title: [BUG] SKImageSourceHandler not found in 1.68.1 for iOS project
body:
**Description**
SKImageSourceHandler not found in 1.68.1 for iOS projecct
<!-- a general description goes here -->

**Code**

<!-- a snippet of code that demonstrates the issue -->

**Expected Behavior**
Should be found
<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**
Compile error
<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:   1.68.1
- Last known good version:  1.68.0
- IDE:   Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac
- Platform Target Frameworks: iOS

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Just checking that you have installed the SkiaSharp.Views.Forms NuGet into the iOS project? That type should be in that package.

I can see it there: https://www.fuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms/1.68.1/lib/xamarin.ios/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.dll/SkiaSharp.Views.Forms/SKImageImageSource

comments.author: pmahend1
comments.body:
This is what we are getting on iOS project  

https://github.com/pmahend1/XamarinFormsIssues/blob/master/SkiaImageSourceHandlerIssue/SkiaImageSourceHandlerIssue.iOS/UIViewController1.cs

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21352870/69985513-54cf9280-1509-11ea-9ab8-c481e2efba4a.png)

comments.author: pmahend1
comments.body:
@mattleibow  is it because of this change in nuspec?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/21352870/69988670-1689a180-1510-11ea-83e8-d998d82bdcd0.png)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
It shouldn't be since iOS is .NET Standard 2.0 and the type should be in THAT nuget, not the dependencies.

Let me have a look at your repo.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I had a look and I see what is happening here. I moved the netstandard library into the ref folder in the nuget so that it won't actually run. But, it appears that the ref folder overrides ALL the platforms.

This typically is fine if the APIs are the same, but because we have more public types (such as SKImageSourceHandler) in the iOS (and the others) this doesn't work.

Fixing this in https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1044 and I hope to push this out ASAP. I have a few fixes in there as well.

comments.author: mattleibow
pmahend1
comments.body: I checked ,it seem to have fixed the issue. @mattleibow Please let me know once you release into nuget org.
